Question: This person was the Head of Pageantry for the 1960 Winter Olympics.
Hints: Following the creation of two cartoon series, in 1934 this person began planning a full-length feature.
This person holds the record for both the most Academy Award nominations (59) and the number of Oscars awarded (22).
In his later years, this person devoted substantial time to funding The California Institute of the Arts (CalArts).
